### ADVANCED KERNEL PREFERENCES

# Custom linux logo
LINUX_LOGO="linux_clut224.ppm"

# Enable additional modules
MODULES="CONFIG_MODULE_SIG=y CONFIG_CIFS_POSIX=y CONFIG_EFI=y CONFIG_DMI=y CONFIG_SYSFB_SIMPLEFB=y \
	CONFIG_EFI_ARMSTUB_DTB_LOADER=y CONFIG_EFI_BOOTLOADER_CONTROL=y CONFIG_RESET_ATTACK_MITIGATION=y \
	CONFIG_NVME_HWMON=y"

### DO NOT EDIT BELOW THIS LINE
KERNEL_PREFERENCES="6.9"
